entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
